quotes.quote: It is far better to put away fear than to be driven by it.
Be driven, be focused, but enjoy every moment, because it only happens once.
You have to be driven. You have to be focused. You have to be aware.
Conceit is vanity driven from all other shifts, and forced to appeal to itself for admiration.
Every driven person comes from a mountain of pain they wish to keep hidden.
Be a leader who is driven by purpose but not by position or power.
Remembrance is the only paradise out of which we cannot be driven away.
Status-driven, conspicuous consumption thrives from the language of novelty.
Either we are running â€˜from' what we fear, or running â€˜to' what we fear. The former is a choice driven by fear, the latter is an action inspired by it.
Productivity is driven at the enterprise level. Better wages, better performing workplaces, are driven at the workplace level.
Men are driven by two principal impulses, either by love or by fear.
We were driven off like rats in five minutes.
Through a policy driven approach we have wage a war against poverty and we are confident we will win this war.
To be honest, once you've driven around for about five, 10 laps, you don't notice a difference.
If you're really driven and you want something deep, hard enough in life, you're going to get it.
Man has been driven out of the paradise in which he could trust his instincts.
Better to be driven out from among men than to be disliked of children.
Be driven with purpose. Be relentless in your alignment with excellence. Pay no mind to the disimpassioned impotent haters.
We try to be driven by what's a good story, what's truthful, and the drama of what happens next.
Humans are driven by a perpetual and restless desire of power.
One thought driven home is better than three left on base.
We will not be driven by fear into an age of unreason.
Human progress has always been driven by a sense of adventure and unconventional thinking.
We are driven by the usual insatiable curiosity of the scientist, and our work is a delightful game.
If someone tells you it can't be done. Smile and humbly agree. Then go back and work so hard that you can prove them wrong equally as fast.
The virtuous man is driven by responsibility, the non-virtuous man is driven by profit.
If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.
The stuff that works best is driven by passion rather than dollars.
Nobody is driven by abstractions like 'seeking truth.
We are finally driven to monogamy not by morality but by exhaustion.
We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.
Driven by the forces of love, the fragments of the world seek each other so that the world may come to being.
Imagination is what has driven human progress since very early times.
